title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
### Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins

**Elevate Your Holiday Table with Grace and Reverence**

Transform your Christmas gatherings into a heartfelt celebration with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. These exquisite cloth napkins are more than just a table setting; they are a beautiful way to honor the true spirit of the season.

**Key Features:**

- **Nativity Scene Design:** Each napkin features a serene Nativity scene, capturing the essence of the Christmas story and the birth of Jesus Christ.
- **Gold Embroidered Texts:** Delicately embroidered with inspiring words like "Joy," "Love," "Blessed," "Merry," "Believe," and "Peace," these napkins add a touch of elegance and faith to your holiday table.
- **Smooth and Glossy Finish:** Made from high-quality polyester, these napkins have a smooth and glossy finish that feels luxurious to the touch.
- **Reusability:** Washable and reusable, these napkins are not only environmentally friendly but also a cost-effective choice for your holiday preparations.
- **Perfect Size:** Measuring 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), these napkins are the ideal size for any table setting.
- **Christmas Gatherings and Meals:** Whether it's a family dinner, church potluck, or a festive holiday party, these napkins are perfect for any occasion that celebrates the spirit of Christmas.
- **Thoughtful Gift Idea:** A beautiful and meaningful gift for family, friends, or fellow believers, these napkins are sure to be cherished for years to come.

**Product Details:**

- **Design Theme:** Nativity scene with a festive atmosphere
- **Quantity:** 12 napkins per set
- **Material:** Polyester
- **Finish:** Smooth and glossy
- **Main Color:** Blue with gold embroidered texts
- **Size:** 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm)
- **Embroidered Designs:** "Joy," "Love," "Blessed," "Merry," "Believe," "Peace"
- **Suitability:** Ideal for Christmas gatherings, meals, and other religious or festive occasions
- **Symbolism:** Jesus-themed text designs with deep religious significance

**Package Contents:**

- **12 Embroidered Christmas Cloth Napkins**

**Additional Notes:**

- **Slight Measurement Tolerance:** Due to manual measurement, there may be slight size variations.
- **Color Variance:** The color may appear slightly different due to screen display settings.
- **Trademark Information:** Words used are for expression only and not as trademarks.

**Bring the Christmas Spirit to Your Table**

The Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins is more than just a table accessory; it's a way to share the joy and love of the season with your loved ones. Add a touch of elegance and faith to your holiday table and create memorable moments this Christmas. Order your set today and make your celebrations truly special!
